title: Marble fireplace

properties.name: description
properties.value: A marble fireplace can be built in the fireplace space of the parlour, dining room, and bedroom in a player-owned house. It requires 63 Construction to build and when built, it gives 500 experience. The player must have a hammer and a saw in their inventory to build it. Goblin decorations can be used on the fireplace to make a decorated marble fireplace.

A marble fireplace can be built in the fireplace space of the parlour, dining room, and bedroom in a player-owned house. It requires 63 Construction to build and when built, it gives 500 experience. The player must have a hammer and a saw in their inventory to build it. Goblin decorations can be used on the fireplace to make a decorated marble fireplace.

To light a fire in the fireplace, logs are needed in the inventory. Lighting it gives 80 Firemaking experience.

A '''marble fireplace''' can be built in the [[fireplace space]] of the [[parlour]], [[dining room]], and [[bedroom]] in a [[player-owned house]]. It requires 63 [[Construction]] to build and when built, it gives 500 [[experience]]. The player must have a [[hammer]] and a [[saw]] in their inventory to build it. [[Goblin decorations]] can be used on the fireplace to make a decorated marble fireplace.

To light a fire in the fireplace, [[logs]] are needed in the inventory. Lighting it gives 80 [[Firemaking]] experience.
